name: Is it wrong to feed haterz to my plants?
name_original: Is it wrong to feed haterz to my plants?
description:
Ludum Dare 46 - "Keep it alive"

by team PLANTZ vs HATERZ.

How your emotional state affects how you raise a plant.

A baby monster plant that eats mean people.

Tap as needed. Mobile browser friendly.

Protips:

  • there are 3 resources to manage: light, water, and food.
  • all three resources should be kept in between the skulls. 
  • too much is bad, too little is also bad.
  • close/open the blinds to dampen the effects of sunlight and nightlight.
  • water and food is affected by your avatar's mood.
  • when avatar is happy, they tend to neglect plant a bit, food and water level drops.
  • when avatar is lonely, they tend to dote on the plant more. food and water level increases.
  • watercans and hairdryers can help manage moisture.
  • haterz gonna hate, until you feed them to your plant. that is.
  • tap three times on the jerks passin by outside to feed them to your plant.
  • plant always likes eating haterz and can never get too many.
